hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:‘Whoever does not give up evil and ignorant speech, and acting in accordance with that, Allah has no need of his giving up his food and drink.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْغِيبَةِ وَالرَّفَثِ لِلصَّائِمِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning backbiting and obscene speech while fasting
